mapper.select: SELECT OI.ORD_NO, OI.TOTAL_ORD_PRICE, OI.PAYMENT_TP, DATE_FORMAT(OI.ORD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ORD_DT, OI.ORD_STAT, OI.USR_RCV_TIME, OI.RCV_TIME, OI.RCV_YN, OI.ORD_CANCEL_YN, OI.ORD_CANCEL_TIME, UI.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO UI, ORDER_INFO OI WHERE OI.ORD_NO = OI.ORD_NO AND UI.USER_NO = OI.USER_NO AND OI.ORD_STAT < 4;
SELECT PI.PRDT_NAME, PI.PRDT_PRICE, OT.ORD_AMNT FROM ORDER_INFO OI, ORDER_ITEM OT, PRODUCT_INFO PI WHERE OT.ORD_NO = OI.ORD_NO AND OI.ORD_NO = #{orderNo} AND OT.PRDT_NO = PI.PRDT_NO;
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_INFO SET ORD_STAT = #{statNo} WHERE ORD_NO = #{ordNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_INFO ( ORD_NO, TOTAL_ORD_PRICE, PAYMENT_TP, ORD_DT, ORD_STAT, USR_RCV_TIME, RCV_YN, USER_NO, REG_USER_NO, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{ord_no}, #{total_ord_price}, #{payment_tp}, NOW(), '1', #{usr_rcv_time}, #{rcv_yn}, #{user_no}, #{user_no}, NOW() );

INSERT INTO ORDER_ITEM ( ORD_NO, PRDT_NO, ORD_AMNT, REG_USER_NO, REG_DT ) VALUES
((SELECT ORD_NO FROM ORDER_INFO WHERE USER_NO = #{item.reg_user_no} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC LIMIT 1), #{item.prdt_no}, #{item.ord_amnt}, #{item.reg_user_no}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT ORD_NO, TOTAL_ORD_PRICE, DATE_FORMAT(ORD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ORD_DT, ORD_STAT FROM ORDER_INFO WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} ORDER BY ORD_NO DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT PI.PRDT_NAME, PI.PRDT_PRICE, OT.ORD_AMNT FROM ORDER_INFO OI, ORDER_ITEM OT, PRODUCT_INFO PI WHERE OT.ORD_NO = OI.ORD_NO AND OI.ORD_NO = #{orderNo} AND OT.PRDT_NO = PI.PRDT_NO;
SELECT ORD_NO, TOTAL_ORD_PRICE, DATE_FORMAT(ORD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ORD_DT, ORD_STAT FROM ORDER_INFO WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} ORDER BY ORD_NO DESC LIMIT 5 OFFSET ${count}
SELECT ORD_NO FROM ORDER_INFO WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC LIMIT 1;
